Name: Muscadine
Description: The inner flesh is rich and thick, with an intense sweetness like a Concord grape, and they have tough spicy skins that taste like plums!

DescriptionLocalization.es: La pulpa interna es rica y espesa, con una dulzura intensa como una uva Concord, y tienen pieles picantes y duras que saben a ciruelas.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 콩포드 포도처럼 과육은 매우 달콤하지만, 달리 껍질은 마치 자두같은 강렬한 맛이 납니다.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 果肉饱满，像康科特葡萄非常甜。表皮非常粗糙，口感像李子
